thread.title: Customer Pete Rich
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer Pete Rich

author: Customer Pete Rich
title: Customer Pete Rich
text: I placed the order on Saturday night and had my tyres fitted Monday. Ordering was easy , the appointment was confirmed Monday morning and the tyres were fitted at the correct time. The fitter (Michael) was knowledgeable and keen to answer any questions I had. I will use this company again and have no hesitation in recommending them to family and friends.
